fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / ultraliberal dream quest
fields.Condition: IsTaskActive("TASK.sell_art_for_gains")  and  Variable["cargo.orb_ultralib_container_door_clicked"] == false  and  Variable["cargo.mrlb_greet_done"] == false
fields.Description: Savoir Faire hears wealth humming in the container -- whether it's raised or lowered. Also gives you instant access to MRLBG.

fields.Title: START
input
Savoir Faire: "See that massive container there, h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: See that massive container there, held up by that humongous crane? That's it! We need to get that box of treasures down. Try using that control panel over there.

fields.Title: You: "Yes, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, but...

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "There! In that container you moved...."
fields.Dialogue Text: There! In that container you moved. There's *something* rich in there. We've got to get inside.

fields.Title: You: "What do you suggest?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What do you suggest?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "The ominous hum of a preposterously..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The ominous hum of a preposterously affluent individual... It seems to be coming from above us.

fields.Title: You: "(Look up.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Look up.)

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "No, not the rain -- the ominous hum..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, not the rain -- the ominous hum of a *preposterously affluent individual*... It seems to be coming from above us.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "No, not the snow -- the ominous hum..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, not the snow -- the ominous hum of a *preposterously affluent individual*... It seems to be coming from above us.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Opening the door? C'mon, I shouldn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Opening the door? C'mon, I shouldn't have to tell you that. Get me up close and I'll show you how it's done.

fields.Title: You: "I don't hear anything."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't hear anything.

fields.Title: You: "Let's slow down here. Why would we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's slow down here. Why would we search for rich people in containers?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "No 'buts', I want to see your *can-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No 'buts', I want to see your *can-do* attitude shine this time. Get moving!

fields.Title: You: "Wait, you mean tax havens?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, you mean tax havens?

fields.Title: You: "But I already tried to convince it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But I already tried to convince it to open for me and failed.

fields.Title: You: "No problemo, boss-man. On my way to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No problemo, boss-man. On my way to lower that crane... [Leave.]

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "*Slow down*? We don't have time to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Slow down*? We don't have time to slow down -- it's *crunch time*! Get your ass moving and control that crane! We've got sales to make.

fields.Title: greetinghub
You: "Wait, OFCs?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, OFCs?

fields.Title: You: "Everything gets so quiet when it sn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everything gets so quiet when it snows.

fields.Title: You: "Hear what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Hear what?

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.crane_container_moved"]
Variable["cargo.crane_container_moved"]
!(Variable["cargo.crane_container_moved"])
Savoir Faire: "Psst, hear that?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Psst, hear that?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, I'm sure. *Someone* here has a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, I'm sure. *Someone* here has assets stacked away in OFCs. Look up.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Great *work* ethic, friend. No one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Great *work* ethic, friend. No one should be scared to get their hands dirty on the road to brilliant *success*.

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.container_rhetoric_wc"]
Variable["cargo.container_rhetoric_wc"]
!(Variable["cargo.container_rhetoric_wc"])
Savoir Faire: "Then it's time to show you how a *m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Then it's time to show you how a *master* does it. No lock survives a round with Savvy. Get me up close.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear dock water quietly lapping..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear dock water quietly lapping against seaweed-slimed concrete, but definitely no ominous hums.

fields.Title: You: "You mean the rain?"
fields.Dialogue Text: You mean the rain?

fields.Title: Logic: "Hold up a minute... why should a pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold up a minute... why should a preposterously affluent individual be hiding themselves in a container?

fields.Title: You: "I don't see anyone. Are you sure?"
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't see anyone. Are you sure?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "OFCs or Offshore Financial Centres..."
fields.Dialogue Text: OFCs or Offshore Financial Centres -- that's another word for tax havens. EPIS has adopted the OFFNET approach into their frameworks for addressing OFCs, but it's still a problem.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Here we are. Whoever is in there de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here we are. Whoever is in there definitely has money, so let's convince them to part with it for our *exclusive* piece of art.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Tax havens, OFCs, Sinks, Conduits,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tax havens, OFCs, Sinks, Conduits, *heavens*... Get with the terms, hustler-boy. Now look up!
